settings.content:
We're so confident that you're going to love your Bright Body Baby goodies that we offer a Guarantee on our mini sized products. Try out any of our products in a mini size and if you don't love it within 30 days of delivery, reach out to us at info@brightbodybaby.comand we'll issue a refund.

We also appreciate any feedback you have as to what made your experience less than ideal. We value your input and are all about constant improvement.

If you're not happy with a full size product within 30 days of delivery, we offer store credit and exchanges.

Terms and Conditions

  • Products must be purchased directly from brightbodybaby.com, we do not accept returns from our retail partners.
  • Original shipping charges are non-refundable. Any shipping charges incurred in an exchange are the responsibility of the customer.
  • Custom products and items marked final sale are non-returnable and non-refundable.
